episodes.title: Online Class 01: JavaScript I
episodes.description: This class provides an introduction to the JavaScript scripting language, that can be used to add functionality to web pages.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.

episodes.title: Online Class 02: JavaScript II
episodes.description: In this class we look at how to add rollovers using JavaScript.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.

episodes.title: Online Class 03: JavaScript III
episodes.description: Alerts and Dialogs can be used to get the user's attention and to solicit input. The input can alter the behavior of the page.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.

episodes.title: Online Class 04: JavaScript IV
episodes.description: Cookies can be used to remember information about a visitor until their next visit to the site, and to pass variables between pages.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.

episodes.title: Online Class 05: JavaScript V
episodes.description: This class discusses how JavaScript can save time and resources by vetting user input before sending it to be processed.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development
podcast.description: SOFT6008 Interactive Web Development Lecturer: Colin Manning. This an introductory JavaScript course.
